Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory160.png'}
{2: 'The Corrupted along the exit route have been wiped out.', 3: '4'}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: 'Great... that should buy us a few more days.'}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: 'Maybe we can hold out until the expedition gets back...'}
{2: 'Expedition?', 3: '7'}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: 'As you can see, our Central Purification Filter had a malfunction.'}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: 'Its power is dwindling at a rate of 4% per day.'}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: 'And starting today, it can no longer cover the areas outside the city walls.'}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: "At this rate, Wuming city will lose its protection in two weeks' time."}
{2: "Can't it be fixed?", 3: '12'}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: 'It can be...'}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: "It's just that the parts warehouse is located in the old city district, which was originally within the range of the Central Purification Filter."}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: 'But now that area is crawling with danger.'}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: "And so far we haven't been able to get in touch with the expedition we sent out..."}
{2: "We'll go looking for them.", 3: '18'}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: 'Really?!'}
{2: "We're here to help you...", 3: '20'}
{2: "Under President Hassen's orders.", 3: '21'}
{2: 'Mayor', 3: "Okay! I'll... wait for your good news."}
